name: NidaaFM
0:
”Alexa, open Nidaa radio”
”Alexa, play Nidaa radio”
”Alexa, launch Nidaa radio”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nidaa radio
des:
Nidaa Al-Ma'rifa is a licensed Lebanese radio station, first class, political, social and cultural, whose broadcast extends from Beirut to the whole world. It keeps you up to date with everything new that happens in Lebanon and the world, with professional objectivity and media professionalism that has extended for decades. 

Nidaa Al-Ma'rifa provides a 24/7 broadcast service in Arabic.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
